changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_character_title') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_character_title GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_character_title @character_id dbo.id_t, @titel_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Character_Titles(character_id, title_code) VALUES(@character_id , @titel_code)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_character_title') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_character_title GO
